MAIN_LABEL: How likely would you be to fall asleep right now if you were:
COMPLETE_LABEL: Complete. Click DONE or continue to adjust
SCALE_3_DESC: Sitting, inactive in a public place
SCALE_4_DESC: As a car passenger for an hour
SCALE_5_DESC: Lying down to rest in the afternoon
SCALE_7_DESC: In a car, while stopped in traffic for a few minutes
KSS_QUESTION: How sleepy do you feel right now?
KSS_COMPLETE: Complete. Click DONE or continue to adjust
KSS_LABEL_7: 7  Sleepy, but no difficulty remaining awake
KSS_LABEL_8: 8  Sleepy, some effort to keep awake; fighting sleep
KSS_LABEL_9: 9  Very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep; urgent need to sleep
